ygData.messageBody:
It seems that the area of effect spells all have
different ranges and shapes. I cant seem to figure
out the third circle spell Column of Frost. every
time I have targetted a monster or party member, only
one monster seems to be affected. Am I supposed to
line up the monsters so they make up a column in front
of me? What exactly is the area?

Also, this spell seems to have a very short range,
relative to the (albeit unuseful) 2nd circle
Icestrike.

I have also heard that for AE spells, targetting party
members is better than targetting the monster. Is
this b/c (1) its maximizes the range and number of
monsters affected or (2) b/c it gets the monsters less
mad at you?

Thanks.

Vhea
9th lvl high elf wizard
Mithaniel Marr
